Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.client.graphic.gui

Class GuiGraphicHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.client.graphic.GraphicHandler
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.client.graphic.gui.GuiGraphicHandler
public class GuiGraphicHandler
extends GraphicHandler

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GuiGraphicHandler​(ClientBG clientBG)
    Non default constructor that sets the ClientBG attribute both in this class and in the ServerIPChoiceController class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void connectionDenied()  
    void connectionUp()  
    void updateBoardChange​(CellMessage cellMessage)
    This method updates the cli board changing the symbol of a cell, based on the fact that a worker can build on a cell.
    void updateMenuChange​(ActionRequest request)
    This method updates the graphics of the client displaying the message of the action request, waiting and sending the response through the ClientBG object.
    void updateMenuChange​(CardRequest request)
    This method updates the graphics of the client displaying the message of the single card request, waiting and sending the response through the ClientBG object.
    void updateMenuChange​(ChangeNickRequest request)
    This method updates the graphics of the client displaying the message of the request for a change of the nick, since the chosen one is already in use.
    void updateMenuChange​(ChooseStarterMessage message)
    This method updates the graphics of the client displaying the request for the player who will be chosen to be the one starting the game.
    void updateMenuChange​(EndGameMessage message)
    This method updates the graphics of the client displaying the message of the end of the game.
    void updateMenuChange​(InitialCardsRequest request)
    This method updates the graphics of the client displaying the message of the initial cards request, waiting and sending the response through the ClientBG object.
    void updateMenuChange​(PlayersListMessage message)
    This method updates the graphics of the client displaying players' nicknames, the Gods they've chosen and their workers' color.
    void updateMenuChange​(PlayersNumberRequest request)
    This method updates the graphics of the client displaying the message of the players number request, waiting and sending the response through the ClientBG object.
    void updateMenuChange​(RequestMessage request)
    This method updates the graphics of the client displaying the message of the generic request that needs a boolean as a response, waiting and sending the response through the ClientBG object.
    void updateMenuChange​(StartGameMessage message)
    This method updates the graphics of the client displaying, at the beginning of the game, some useful information about the state of the game preparation.
    void updateMenuChange​(TextMessage message)
    This method updates the graphics of the client displaying the message at the top of the screen (used to write that it's someone else's turn).
    void updateMenuChange​(WorkersColorRequest request)
    This method updates the graphics of the client displaying the message of the workers color request, waiting and sending the response through the ClientBG object.

      public void updateBoardChange​(CellMessage cellMessage)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      cellMessage - message containing the cell that has changed (a worker has built on it)

      Specified by:
      updateMenuChange in class GraphicHandler
      Parameters:
      request - message that notifies the client that the nick he has just chosen is already taken
